name: To Touch The Stars
description:
To Touch The Stars is a game made for the Pixel Game Maker MV - Summer Game Jam 2021 contest. 

Collect star fragments and use their power to fight off the clouds as they try to steal the star crystals. 

How to Play

This download is a portable installer. Unzip the folder to install the game wherever you would like. Double click the player.exe file to play the game. 

Controls

Move - D-Pad or Arrow Keys

Punch Attack - A Button or Z on Keyboard

Star Attack - X or B Button or X on Keyboard

Credits

Programmer:

Richie Leahey - Leahey Media

Artwork:

Music:
